
### some POSIX command-line features  {.smaller}


* [searching for programs]{.fragment fragment-index=2 .custom .myem-only} 

   * `ls -l`  \\textrightarrow{}  `/bin/ls -l`
   * `make` \\textrightarrow{} `/usr/bin/make`

* running in background 

   * `./someprogram &`

* [redirection]{.fragment fragment-index=4 .custom .myem-only}: 

   * `./someprogram >output.txt`
   * `./someprogram <input.txt`

* [pipelines]{.fragment fragment-index=5 .custom .myem-only}: 

   * `./someprogram | ./somefilter`
